channel.title: The Cloudflare Blog
channel.description: Get the latest news on how products at Cloudflare are built, technologies used, and join the teams helping to build a better Internet.

item.title: 【Making WAF ML models go brrr: saving decades of processing time】让 WAF ML 模型变得更好：节省数十年的处理时间
item.description: 【 In this post, we discuss the performance optimizations we've implemented for our WAF ML product. We'll guide you through specific code examples and benchmark numbers, and we'll share the impressive latency reduction numbers observed after the rollout 】在这篇文章中，我们将讨论我们为 WAF ML 产品实施的性能优化。我们将指导您完成具体的代码示例和基准数据，并且我们将分享推出后观察到的令人印象深刻的延迟减少数字

item.title: 【Introducing Automatic SSL/TLS: securing and simplifying origin connectivity】引入自动 SSL/TLS：保护和简化源连接
item.description: 【 This new Automatic SSL/TLS setting will maximize and simplify the encryption modes Cloudflare uses to communicate with origin servers by using the SSL/TLS Recommender 】这一新的自动 SSL/TLS 设置将最大化并简化 Cloudflare 通过使用 SSL/TLS Recommender 与源服务器进行通信的加密模式

item.title: 【Exploring Internet traffic during the 2024 U.S. Republican National Convention】探索 2024 年美国共和党全国代表大会期间的互联网流量
item.description: 【 This week, the Republican National Convention was hosted in Milwaukee, Wisconsin from July 15 to 18, 2024. We examined traffic shifts and cyberattacks since June 2024 to see how these events have impacted the Internet 】本周，共和党全国代表大会于 2024 年 7 月 15 日至 18 日在威斯康星州密尔沃基举行。我们研究了 2024 年 6 月以来的流量变化和网络攻击，以了解这些事件如何影响互联网

item.title: 【A recent spate of Internet disruptions】最近一系列的互联网中断
item.description: 【 Cloudflare Radar is constantly monitoring the Internet for widespread disruptions. Here we examine several recent noteworthy disruptions detected in the first month of Q3, including traffic anomalies observed in Bangladesh, Syria, Pakistan, and Venezuela 】Cloudflare Radar 持续监控互联网是否存在大范围中断。在这里，我们研究了第三季度第一个月最近检测到的几个值得注意的中断，包括在孟加拉国、叙利亚、巴基斯坦和委内瑞拉观察到的交通异常

item.title: 【Celebrating one year of Project Cybersafe Schools】庆祝网络安全学校项目一周年
item.description: 【 August 8, 2024, marks the first anniversary of Project Cybersafe Schools, Cloudflare’s initiative to provide small K-12 public school districts in the United States with a package of Zero Trust cybersecurity solutions – for free, and with no time limit 】2024 年 8 月 8 日是网络安全学校项目一周年纪念日，该项目是 Cloudflare 的一项举措，旨在为美国小型 K-12 公立学区免费提供一揽子零信任网络安全解决方案，且没有时间限制

item.title: 【Avoiding downtime: modern alternatives to outdated certificate pinning practices】避免停机：过时的证书固定做法的现代替代方案
item.description: 【 The number of outages caused by certificate pinning is increasing. We’ll explore why certificate pinning hasn’t kept up with modern standards and recommend alternatives to improve security while reducing management overhead 】由证书固定导致的中断数量正在增加。我们将探讨为什么证书固定没有跟上现代标准，并推荐替代方案来提高安全性，同时减少管理开销

item.title: 【How the Paris 2024 Summer Olympics has impacted Internet traffic】巴黎 2024 年夏季奥运会对互联网流量有何影响
item.description: 【 This blog post explores the impact of the Paris 2024 Summer Olympics on Internet traffic in France and beyond, concentrating on web activity during the opening ceremony and the initial days of competition. Let the games continue 】这篇博文探讨了 2024 年巴黎夏季奥运会对法国及其他地区互联网流量的影响，重点关注开幕式和比赛初期的网络活动。让比赛继续进行

item.title: 【Meta Llama 3.1 now available on Workers AI】Meta Llama 3.1 现已在 Workers AI 上可用
item.description: 【 Cloudflare is excited to be a launch partner with Meta to introduce Workers AI support for Llama 3.1 】Cloudflare 很高兴成为 Meta 的发布合作伙伴，推出对 Llama 3.1 的 Workers AI 支持

item.title: 【The backbone behind Cloudflare’s Connectivity Cloud】Cloudflare 连接云背后的支柱
item.description: 【 Read through the latest milestones and expansions of Cloudflare's global backbone and how it supports our Connectivity Cloud and our services 】了解 Cloudflare 全球主干网的最新里程碑和扩展，以及它如何支持我们的 Connectivity Cloud 和我们的服务

item.title: 【Countdown to Paris 2024 Olympics: France leads in web interest】2024 年巴黎奥运会倒计时：法国在网络兴趣方面领先
item.description: 【 As the Paris 2024 Olympics approach, our analysis reveals France, the host nation, leads in DNS traffic to official Olympic sites, followed by the UK, the US, and Australia 】随着 2024 年巴黎奥运会的临近，我们的分析显示，主办国法国在奥运会官方网站的 DNS 流量方面处于领先地位，其次是英国、美国和澳大利亚
